column4: I think the problem is most of the extensions are not built for the 64 bit libraries
because my system is completely 64 bit
but I think it did need a little bit of porting to work
internally it is all the same
but the application loader itself and that sort of thing probably had to be ported
yes i know that but i have to make minimum size very big to make it behave like it used to
but this is a silly bug
have you also noticed the nautilus zooming makes fonts too small to read smaller than the minium set it gnome-font-properties
just set it a tad larger
